name: Invasion: Family Ties
description:
Rick travels to Indiana to visit his mother, but during his stay, unexpected events occur that lead him on a thrilling adventure. As Rick navigates through the challenges of his visit, he uncovers a series of mysterious occurrences that keep him on his toes. Along the way, he must overcome obstacles and solve puzzles to ensure his visit goes smoothly. However, little does he know that a major threat looms on the horizon that will change everything. Will Rick be able to save the day and protect those he cares about?

Invasion: Family Ties is a third-person adventure game where you play as Rick. Set in Indiana, you'll need to explore your surroundings to uncover the source of a mysterious and unusual event.
